title: Today’s Dead Cat Bounce for BTC
description: After the bloodbath to start the month, crypto markets regained their footing with strong bids across the board. Bitcoin touched below $99,000, but has since gone up over $104,000 and is trading close to that level today. The strong bid came in rapidly once the critical $100,000 level was breached, as several market participants saw ... title: Ex-Banker Brothers Worth $850 Million After Microsoft AI Deal
description: For a few years, Daniel and Will Roberts’ Bitcoin-mining venture was a wild ride. The former Macquarie Group Ltd. bankers took IREN Ltd. public in November 2021, just as the pandemic-fueled crypto mania peaked.

title: Will Coinbase Global (COIN) Stock Blast Through $400?
description: Many people buy and sell Bitcoin (CRYPTO:BTC) and other cryptocurrencies on the Coinbase Global (NASDAQ:COIN) trading platform. If you believe that the crypto space will grow during the next year or two, then it makes sense to buy COIN stock in anticipation of higher prices. Yet, it’s not as simple as that. title: Will Bitcoin Rebound to $120K Before 2026?
description: In October 2025, Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) suffered a sharp fall, losing about $20,000 amid a $19 billion crypto market wipeout triggered by U.S.–China trade tensions. With the shakeout still fresh, many investors are asking: can Bitcoin rebound to $120,000 before 2026?  The recent crash has injected caution into the market, yet underlying demand and institutional ...
